channel.title: Wierd problem
channel.description: Well, i am using dragon-history as base but when i was testing d claws i noticed you have to need 60 defence also 2nd problem not rly one but whats the code to make a command wield a weapon

item.title: Wierd problem
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

Find the item ID in the client class (Or if it uses another class for requirments, find it there) and remove it.

As for your second one, I havenâ€™t worked with servers in a while, but I think:

command.startsWith("equip") {
    int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));
    wear(id, WEAPON_SLOT);
}

Read full topic
